News.headline: Extended Highlights: Dagenham and Redbridge 0 - 0 FC Halifax Town

News.URL_keywords: Extended Highlights: Dagenham and Redbridge 0 - 0 FC Halifax Town
News.short_description: Fans can now access highlights on YouTube and extended highlights on Daggers PlayerHD of Saturday's Emirates FA Cup fixture against FC Halifax Town.
News.description:
Short, YouTube highlights can be found here or by clicking 'play' below.

Daggers PlayerHD subscribers can watch extended highlights from the game here.
